name: Obsidian LiveSync Server
longDescription: This is a minimally-configured CouchDB container that can be used with the community-developed synchronisation plug-in for Obsidian. The Self-hosted LiveSync plug-in is a community-developed synchronisation plug-in available on all Obsidian-compatible platforms. It leverages robust server solutions such as CouchDB or object storage systems (e.g., MinIO, S3, R2, etc.) to ensure reliable data synchronisation.
description: This is a minimally-configured CouchDB container that can be used with the community-developed synchronisation plug-in for Obsidian.
